channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Salmonella outbreak linked to California egg distributor sickens 79 people
item.description: U.S. health officials confirmed the salmonella infections were linked to contaminated organic and cage-free brown eggs from August Egg Company. All re...

item.title: Travel ban may shut door for Afghan family to bring niece to US for a better life
Colombia presidential hopeful shot in head at rally
item.description: The opposition senator was hit three times during rally in Bogota and is in a critical condition in hospital.

item.title: Trump orders National Guard to LA after clashes
item.description: The city sees a second day of clashes over raids by federal agents on undocumented migrants.

item.title: Trump deploying National Guard to L.A. as protests ramp up after ICE operations
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom called the move "purposefully inflammatory" and one that "will only escalate tensions."

item.title: Trump officials are vowing to end school desegregation orders. Some parents say they’re still needed
What to know about the L.A. immigration protests after ICE operations
item.description: President Trump ordered that at least 2,000 National Guard troops would be deployed to L.A. "for 60 days or at the discretion of the Secretary of Defe...

item.title: Italian citizenship referendum polarises country
item.description: People are voting on whether to cut from 10 to five years the time required to apply for citizenship.

item.title: An ancient writing system confounding myths about Africa
item.description: How social media is pushing back against the still common idea that African societies never had a knowledge system.

item.title: Bowen: Israel is accused of the gravest war crimes - how governments respond could haunt them for years
item.description: Distinguished lawyers, senior humanitarians and diplomats tell Jeremy Bowen why they are increasingly concerned about the catastrophe inside Gaza

item.title: Colombian senator and presidential hopeful shot in assassination attempt
item.description: Miguel Uribe Turbay is the son of a journalist who was kidnapped and killed in 1991 during one of the country's most violent periods.

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (June 8)
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: 6/7: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Protests, outrage over ICE raids in Southern California; Iconic Goodyear Blimp takes to the skies for 100 years of flights.

item.title: Vance voices loyalty to Trump but says he 'understands' Musk's frustration
